intro.dialog: |C3|One of her [VAL1] tetrids jumps out of her heart and rolls away.
|C3|She chases after it as it rolls itself forward.
|C3|It stops at the base of a strange machine.

ask_q1: What does she do with the tetrid?

feed_tetrid.dialog: |C3|The machine emits many lights and sounds for several seconds.

keep_tetrid.dialog: |C3|She puts the tetrid back inside her heart.

after_card.dialog: |C3|Then a small door opens on the side of the machine with a gift inside.

leave_gift.dialog: |C3|She chooses to leave the gift alone.
